name: Heat Transfer
title: MEAS CHEM_ENG 322-0-20 Heat Transfer
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students need to have completed MATH 220, MATH 224, MATH 230, MATH 234, and GEN_ENG 205-4 with a grade of C or higher in order to register for this course. It is also recommended that they take CHEM_ENG 321 before enrolling in this course.
